text: The Cameron's Brewing Oakville Fall Classic (formerly the Biosteel Oakville Fall Classic) is an annual bonspiel on the men's and women's World Curling Tour and Ontario Curling Tour. It is held annually in September at the Oakville Curling Club in Oakville, Ontario.https://oakvillecurlingclub.com/ The purse for the event $16,000 for both the Men's and Women's. ==Past champions== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
